scripts.build: node scripts/buildShaders && npm run concat && cp sprites/alphabet-tiny.gif dist
scripts.prod: npm run create-dist && npm run minify-glsl && npm run build && node scripts/wrap.js && npm run uglify && node scripts/replace.js && npm run html && npm run zip
scripts.dev: npm run create-dist && cp ./src/shaders/* ./dist/shaders && npm run build && cp ./dist/game-concatenated.js ./dist/bubbas-back-room.min.js && node scripts/replace.js && npm run html
scripts.minify-glsl: glsl-minifier -sT vertex -i ./src/shaders/vertexShader.glsl -o ./dist/shaders/vertexShader.glsl && glsl-minifier -sT fragment -i ./src/shaders/fragmentShader.glsl -o ./dist/shaders/fragmentShader.glsl && glsl-minifier -sT vertex -i ./src/shaders/hitVertexShader.glsl -o ./dist/shaders/hitVertexShader.glsl && glsl-minifier -sT fragment -i ./src/shaders/hitFragmentShader.glsl -o ./dist/shaders/hitFragmentShader.glsl
scripts.zip: mkdir ./dist/bubbas-back-room-eric-rowell-js13k-2019 && cp ./dist/index.html ./dist/bubbas-back-room-eric-rowell-js13k-2019/index.html && cp ./dist/alphabet-tiny.gif ./dist/bubbas-back-room-eric-rowell-js13k-2019 && cd ./dist && zip -9 -r ./bubbas-back-room-eric-rowell-js13k-2019 ./bubbas-back-room-eric-rowell-js13k-2019 && cd .. && echo ================== && ls -l ./dist/bubbas-back-room-eric-rowell-js13k-2019.zip && echo ==================
